thread.title: Chelsea Clinton slams those who ‘make up attacks’ (ahem…)
thread.title_full: Chelsea Clinton slams those who ‘make up attacks’ (ahem…)

author: Doug P.
title: Chelsea Clinton slams those who ‘make up attacks’ (ahem…)
text:
— James Taranto (@jamestaranto) February 3, 2017 
On MSNBC’s Hardball program last night, Kellyanne Conway told Chris Matthews the following: 
“I bet it’s brand new information to people that President Obama had a six-month ban on the Iraqi refugee program after two Iraqis came here to this country, were radicalized and they were the masterminds behind the Bowling Green massacre. It didn’t get covered.” 
Conway has corrected herself and said she meant to say “terrorists”: On @hardball @NBCNews @MSNBC I meant to say "Bowling Green terrorists" as reported here: 
— Kellyanne Conway (@KellyannePolls)   
In spite of that, Chelsea Clinton offered this pointer after comment about an attempted machete attack that was stopped by police in France: Very grateful no one seriously hurt in the Louvre attack …or the (completely fake) Bowling Green Massacre. Please don't make up attacks. 
— Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) February 3, 2017 
Good tip! Pass it on… "Recalling Hillary Clinton’s claim of ‘landing under sniper fire’ in Bosnia" https://t.co/bJOz8FjKfy https://t.co/q3uN2Evigy 
— Mark Hemingway (@Heminator) February 3, 2017 As we all know, lying about acts of violence like, say, coming under sniper fire in Bosnia, is a very dishonest and bad thing to do. https://t.co/aVYPFNQqol 
— T. Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) February 3, 2017 Your mom lied about coming under sniper fire in Bosnia. https://t.co/mLvrq3ASH4 
— Chuck Ross (@ChuckRossDC) February 3, 2017 There's a joke around Bosnia and sniper fire to be written here somewhere… #BowlingGreen https://t.co/qPAx8uft0k 
— Joe Concha (@JoeConchaTV) February 3, 2017 You mean the way @HillaryClinton did when she told everyone she landed in Bosnia under sniper fire? https://t.co/ANFpkZlMpF
